The small map is an item that players can buy from Sir Renitee in White Knights' Castle for 1000 coins, provided that they have at least 51 quest points.

It is used in the Quest Hall of a player-owned house (along with two teak planks) to build the small map in the map hotspot. Doing so requires level 38 Construction, and grants 211 experience.

[[File:Small map (item) detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''small map''' is an item that players can buy from [[Sir Renitee]] in [[White Knights' Castle]] for 1000 coins, provided that they have at least 51 [[quest point]]s.

It is used in the [[Quest Hall]] of a [[player-owned house]] (along with two [[teak plank]]s) to build the [[small map]] in the map hotspot. Doing so requires level 38 [[Construction]], and grants 211 [[experience]].
